title: Glacier National Park: Brochures
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Brochures              Brochures and Publications       Much of what you need to know can be found in our 2016 Glacier Visitor Guide (7.8 MB pdf) Zoom into the map for a lay of the land.  Publications  Looking for something more specific? Glacier National Park has many brochures and publications available online as PDF files and available through the mail. There's even a form where you can order information sent to you. Key trip-planning publications include Day Hikes in Glacier and Ranger-led Activity Schedules (posted monthly in summer).
